definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: The Golden Globe Awards are held in mid-January each year.
sentences.chinese: 金球奖固定于每年的一月中旬举行。

sentences.english: Iaquinta also offered his views on who should win this year's Golden Ball.
sentences.chinese: 亚昆塔也给出了对于今年金球奖得主自己的观点。

sentences.english: The Golden Ball winner beat Storari with a cold-blooded shot from a medium distance to give Milan the lead.
sentences.chinese: 金球奖得主无情的中距离远射击败了斯托拉里。

sentences.english: Do you think that I would argue with the next Ballon d'Or winner?
sentences.chinese: 难道你们认为我会同下一任金球奖得主争吵吗？

sentences.english: This was her third Golden Globe nomination in 10 years.
sentences.chinese: 这是她近10年来第三次被提名金球奖。

sentences.english: Had United retained the Champions League, he'd surely have added the Ballon d'Or.
sentences.chinese: 而曼联也卫冕冠军，他本应再来个金球奖的。

sentences.english: McAvoy was nominated for a Golden Globe for his role in Atonement.
sentences.chinese: 他以《赎罪》中的演出获得了金球奖的提名。

sentences.english: It has won 58 awards, including Golden Globes and Emmys.
sentences.chinese: 荣获过58个奖项，其中包括金球奖和艾美奖。

sentences.english: In fact, Jim was awarded a Golden Globe for his dramatic portrayal.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，因为金的戏剧形象，他曾获过金球奖。

sentences.english: Sawa hero is taking the Golden Boot and Golden Globe.
sentences.chinese: 功臣泽穗希则包揽了金靴奖和金球奖。

sentences.english: Sheva than thanked Paolo Maldini for his praises and his candidature for the Golden Ball.
sentences.chinese: 舍瓦感谢马尔蒂尼对他的赞扬，还有金球奖的提名。

sentences.english: Vicente Del Bosque says he would give the Ballon d'Or to both Andres Iniesta & Xavi.
sentences.chinese: 博斯克称其愿意将金球奖同时颁发给两人。

sentences.english: Entertainment's live red carpet coverage of the 2006 Golden Globes ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 娱乐的生活，2006年金球奖典礼的红地毯覆盖面。

sentences.english: She has been nominated for two Golden Globes.
sentences.chinese: 她曾两次获得金球奖提名。

pinyin: Ao4 si1 ka3 jin1 xiang4 jiang3

definition: Real Madrid soccer team/abbr. for 皇家馬德里|皇家马德里
to win a championship/to come out top/to take the cup
to win the top award/to come first in the examination rankings
La Liga, the top division of the Spanish football league system
Barca (nickname for FC Barcelona)/Baza (town in Grenada, Spain)
